title: "debt_gdp"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)

data <- read.csv("debt_gdp.csv")
data <- data %>%
  rename(Year = "DATE", Debt = "GFDEGDQ188S")


data$Year <- gsub("-01-01","", data$Year)
data$Year <- as.numeric(as.character(data$Year))
head(data)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = Year, y = Debt)) +
  geom_line() + 
  theme_classic()



```
